document_data.name: Eleanor Carrathal
document_data.mainbody: '''Eleanor Carrathal''' was a Queen of [[Callidyrr]] in the early-to-mid 12{{th}} century [[DR]]. She was the wife of [[Edwin Carrathal II|King Edwin II]].{{Cite dragon/362/Grand History of the Realms: The Moonshaes|33}}
document_data.History:
Eleanor and Edwin II had one son, [[Adrian Carrathal|Adrian]], who was born in the {{YearlinkName|1125}}.

She became Queen of Callidyrr when her husband inherited the throne in the {{YearlinkName|1133}}. However, Edwin II died soon after in the {{YearlinkName|1135}}, and because Adrian was only ten years old, Eleanor named King [[Adom Kimball]] of [[Moray]] as regent of Callidyrr.

Adrian assumed the throne six years later, in the {{YearlinkName|1141}}.
